value.title: Row-Level Security and Object-Level Security together in Power BI??? Yup!
value.excerpt: Struggling with using Row-Level Security (RLS) together with Object-Level Security (OLS) in Power BI? You think it can't be done? Think again! Patrick shows you how to use both together.  Announcement Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/blog/object-level-security-ols-is-now-generally-available-in-power-bi-premium-and-pro/

value.title: Sort month name chronologically in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Have you struggled when dragging month name to a chart axis and it is sorted alphabetically in Power BI Desktop? Adam shows you how you can change the sort order to be chronologically instead of alphabetically. This technique can also be used for other categorical columns in Power BI.  ******** LET'S

value.title: STOP publishing your Power BI report until you do these 5 things!

value.title: Power BI From and To Date Filtering with One Slicer
value.excerpt: It happens that you might have two fields as From and To date (or Start and End date) in your dataset, and you want a date slicer in the report. The date slicer has to filter records in a way that the FROM and the TO dates are in the range of dates selected in the slicer. There are multiple ways of doing

value.title: Creating a slicer that filters multiple columns in Power BI

value.title: Make Power BI Awesome with Python

topItems.title: Machine Learning in Power BI

value.title: Deployment Pipelines give you more CONTROL (Power BI Premium)
value.excerpt: With Deployment Pipelines, you can control your application life cycle stages. Keep content in sync at the different stages of your development. Power BI Premium is required.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/deployment-pipelines-process
